db.description: Are you interested and passionate about Western foods? We are looking for young, enthusiastic and high energy people to join our team. At lubu we specialise in the many cuisines of the the Mediterranean region including Spanish, French, Balkan, Greek, Turkish, Middle Eastern & North African.\r\nYou will learn many different styles of Mediterranean cuisines from our very experienced Australian Chef. Staff work either day shifts (8am- 4pm) or (3pm-11pm). The restaurant is closed on Mondays.
db.requirement: Experience is not essential for the apprentice chef position but necessary for other positions. Hard working and willing to learn new skills. Applicants should have a passion for food.

more.requirement: Experience is not essential for the apprentice chef position but necessary for other positions. Hard working and willing to learn new skills. Applicants should have a passion for food.
more.description: Are you interested and passionate about Western foods? We are looking for young, enthusiastic and high energy people to join our team. At lubu we specialise in the many cuisines of the the Mediterranean region including Spanish, French, Balkan, Greek, Turkish, Middle Eastern & North African. You will learn many different styles of Mediterranean cuisines from our very experienced Australian Chef. Staff work either day shifts (8am- 4pm) or (3pm-11pm). The restaurant is closed on Mondays.
